metadata.description: The relationship and reports for person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The person relationship with first training details.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `registration+registration_number` IS NOT NULL THEN 'Passed and Registered' WHEN `exam+results` = 'exam_result|pass' THEN 'Passed, not Registered' WHEN `exam+results` = 'exam_result|fail' THEN 'Did not Pass Exam' ELSE 'Did Not Take Exam' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The results of the exam and registration for the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The year the first training occurred.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The year the exam was taken.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `first_training+graduation` IS NOT NULL OR `exam+exam_date` IS NOT NULL THEN 'Not In Training' WHEN `training_disrupt+disruption_date` IS NOT NULL AND `training_disrupt+resumption_date` IS NULL THEN 'Not In Training' ELSE 'In Training' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A yes/no to determine if the person is still in training or not.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The demographic information for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this person was born.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The most recent deployment for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The first training this person entered.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The cadre of the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The exam details of the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The registration details of the first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The training institution where the first training occurred.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where the training institution is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current training disruption for this training if there is one.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Reports related to people in the system with their first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A pie chart of the number of people entering training by their birth district.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of students entering training by year.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The pass/fail results for each person's first training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The registration results for each person's first training.

configurationGroup.name: student_training_year
configurationGroup.displayName: Student Training by Year Report View

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Students by intake year that are broken down by in or not in training.
